titleStmt.title: Duell-ease A worde with. valiant spiritts shewing the abuse of duells, that valour, refuseth challenges and priuate combates. sett foorth by G.F. a defendour of Christian valoure.
titleStmt.author: G. F., defendour of Christian valoure.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
